title: Why can't i start my LoL from the desktop?
body: As you probably saw from the description, i am having a problem opening the lol launcher from the desktop.Sarting it as an administrator doesn't help.I tried both the lol launched and lol launcher admin.I just click on the icon and nothing happens.The only way to open lol is from the directory i installed it in.Anybody knows a fix, because i am getting bored from clicking hundreds of folders before opening the game every single time..

replies.body:
What happens if you create a shortcut of the lol.launcher.admin.exe file on your desktop? You can do this by right-clicking on the file, hit **copy**, then right-click on the desktop and select **paste shortcut**.

Let me know if this helped!
